class_notes:
(Same as IDS 285W 1)


New title forthcoming: Russian Society and Culture
course_description: Prerequisite: none. Knowledge of Russian is not required. An interdisciplinary course that introduces students to the diversity of Russian culture. Presented against a chronological sequence of Russian history, it covers Orthodoxy, iconography, literature, music, folk beliefs, and customs.
sections: Class Nbr: 2329, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: J. Apkarian, Status: Open
